name: Practical Dependency Management for Developers
summary:
Managing software dependencies is one of the most time-intensive tasks for most software developers. There are nine circles of dependency hell. It takes away from building new features or bringing down technical debt. However, it causes headaches at every step of the development cycle â€” from local development to CI/CD, production, and maintenance.

Some useful tips on wrangling dependencies from someone who worked on large-scale projects, CI/CD, build tools, and more.

Pin your dependencies. If
